mapper.sql: id, name, type, description, price, stock, status, create_time, create_by
mapper.insert: insert into medicine (id, name, type, description, price, stock, status, create_time, create_by) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into medicine
id,
name,
type,
description,
price,
stock,
status,
create_time,
create_by,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update medicine
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update medicine set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, stock = #{stock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM `medicine`
AND name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND type like concat('%',#{type},'%')
AND status = #{status}
ORDER BY id DESC
limit #{page}, #{limit}

SELECT count(id) FROM `medicine`
AND name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND type like concat('%',#{type},'%')
AND status = #{status}
